verses.padam: (Padam) samiti|tvA|si~jcAmi|yaju̍ṣA|prajAmiti̍# pra-jAm|Ayuḥ|dhana̱m|ca||bRuhaspati̍# prasUta iti bRuhaspati# - prasUtaḥ|yajamAnaḥ|iha|mA|riṣat||Ajya̱m|asi|satyam|asi|satyasya̍|addhya̍kṣamityadhi̍# - akṣam|asi|haviḥ|asi|vaiśvAnaram|vaiśvadEvamiti# vaiśva - dEvam|utpUtaśuṣmamityutpU̍ta̍ - śuṣmam|satyaujA iti# satya-OjAḥ|sahaḥ|asi|saha̍mAnam|asi|saha̍sva|arA̍tIḥ|saha̍sva|arAtIyataḥ|saha̍sva|pRuta̍nAḥ|saha̍sva|pRutanyataḥ|sahasra̍vIryamiti̍# sahasra-viryam|asi|tat|mA|jinva|Ajya̍sya|Ajya̱m|asi|satyasya̍|satyam|asi|satyAyuriti̍# satya - Ayuḥ|1 (50)
verses.samhita: saM tvA# si~jcAmi yajuṣA̍ prajAmAyurddhanaM̍ ca|bRuhaspatiprasUtO̍ yajamAna̍ iha mA riṣat||Ajya̍masi̍ satyamasi̍ satyasyAddhyakṣamasi̍ havirasi̍ vaiśvAnaraM ~Mvai̱śvadEva-mutpUtaśuṣmaṃ̍ satyaujAḥ sahO&si̍ sahamAnamasi̍ sahasvArAtIḥ̍ sahasvArAtIyataḥ̍ sahasva̍ pRutanAḥ̍ sahasva̍ pRutanyataḥ|sahasravIryamasi̍ tanmA# jinvAjyasyAjyamasi̍ satyasya# satyamasi̍ satyAyu# - [ ] 1

verses.padam: (Padam) asi|satyaśuṣmamiti̍# satya - śuṣmam|asi|satyEna|tvA|aBIti̍|GArayAmi|tasya̍|tE|BakṣIya|pa~jcAnAm|tvA|vAtA̍nAm|yantrAya̍|dhartrAya̍|gRuhṇAmi|pa~jcAnAm|tvA|RutUnAm|yantrAya̍|dhartrAya̍|gRuhṇAmi|pa~jcAnAm|tvA|diśAm|yantrAya̍|dhartrAya̍|gRuhṇAmi|pa~jcAnAm|tvA|pa~jcajanAnAmiti̍# pa~jca - janAnA̱m|yantrAya|dhartrAya̍|gRuhṇAmi|carOḥ|tvA|pa~jca̍bilasyEti̍ pa~jca# - bilasya|yantrAya|dhartrAya̍|gRuhṇAmi|brahma̍ṇaḥ|tvA|tEja̍sE|yantrAya̍|dhartrAya̍|gRuhṇAmi|kṣatrasya̍|tvA|Oja̍sE|yantrAya̍|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: rasi satyaśuṣmamasi̍ satyEna# tvA&Bi GArayAmi̍ tasya# tE BakṣIya pa~jcAnAM tvA vAtAnAM̍ ~MyantrAya# dhartrAya# gRuhṇAmi pa~jcAnAM tvartUnAM̍ ~MyantrAya# dhartrAya# gRuhṇAmi pa~jcAnAM tvA# diśAM ~MyantrAya# dhartrAya# gRuhṇAmi pa~jcAnAM tvA# pa~jcajanAnA̱M ~MyantrAya# dhartrAya# gRuhṇAmi carOstvA pa~jcabilasya̍ yantrAya# dhartrAya# gRuhṇAmi brahmaṇastvA̍ tEjasE̍ yantrAya# dhartrAya# gRuhṇAmi kṣatrasya tvaujasE̍ yantrAya# - [ ] 2

verses.padam: (Padam) dhartrAya|gRuhṇAmi|viśE|tvA|yantrAya̍|dhartrAya̍|gRuhṇAmi|suvIryAyEti̍# su - vIryAya|tvA|gRuhṇAmi|suprajAstvAyEti̍# suprajAḥ - tvAya|tvA|gRuhṇAmi|rAyaḥ|pOṣA̍ya|tvA|gRuhṇAmi|brahmavarcasAyEti̍# brahma-varcasAya|tvA|gRuhṇAmi|BUḥ|asmAka̱m|haviḥ|dEvAnA̱m|Aśiṣa̍ ityA̱-śiṣaḥ|yaja̍mAnasya|dEvAnA̱m|tvA|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|gRuhṇAmi|kAmA̍ya|tvA|gRuhṇAmi||3̍ (33) (satyAyu-rOjasE̍ yantrAya-trayastriṃśacca)̍ (A1)
verses.samhita: dhartrAya# gRuhṇAmi viśE tvA# yantrAya# dhartrAya# gRuhṇAmi suvIryAya̍ tvA gRuhṇAmi suprajAstvAya# tvA gRuhṇAmi rAyaspOṣAya̍ tvA gRuhṇAmi brahmavarcasAya# tvA gRuhṇAmi BUrasmAkaṃ# havirdEvAnA-mAśiṣO̍ yajamAnasya̍ dEvAnA̱M tvA dEvatA̱ByO gRuhṇAmi kAmAya̍ tvA gRuhṇAmi||3 (satyAyu-rOjasE̍ yantrAya-trayastriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) dhruvaḥ|asi|dhruvaḥ|aham|sajAtEṣviti# sa - jAtEṣu|BUyAsam|dhIra̍ḥ|cEttA̱|vasuviditi̍# vasu - vit|ugraḥ|asi|ugraḥ|aham|sajAtEṣviti# sa-jAtEṣu|BUyAsam|ugraḥ|cEttA̱|vasuviditi̍# vasu - vit|aBiBUrityaBi̍ - BUḥ|asi|aBiBUrityaBi̍ - BUḥ|aham|sajAtEṣviti# sa - jAtEṣu|BUyAsam|aBiBUritya̍Bi̍ - BUḥ|cEttA̱|vasuviditi# vasu-vit|yunajmi|tvA|brahma̍ṇA|daivyE̍na|havyAya̍|asmai|vOḍhavE|jAtavEda̍ iti# jAta - vEdaḥ||indhAnAḥ|tvA|suprajasa̍ iti# su - prajasaḥ|suvIrA̍ iti# su - vIrA̱ḥ|jyOk|jIvEma|balihRuta iti# bali - hRutaḥ|vayam|tE||yat|mE|agnE|asya|yajñasya̍|riṣyA̱t|4̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dhruvO&si̍ dhruvO&haṃ̍ sajAtEṣu̍# BUyAsaM dhIraścEttA# vasuvidugrO̱&syugrO&haṃ̍ sajAtEṣu̍# BUyAsa-mugraścEttA# vasuvidaBi-BUra̍syaBiBUrahaṃ̍ sajAtEṣu̍# BUyAsamaBiBUścEttA# vasuvid yuqnajmi# tvA brahmaṇA̍ daivyEna̍ havyAyAsmai vOḍhavE jAtavEdaḥ||indhA̍nAstvA̍ suprajasaḥ̍ suvIrA jyOgjIvEma̍ balihRutO# vayaM tE̱||yanmE# agnE asya yajñasya riṣyA - [ ] 4

verses.padam: (Padam) yat|vA|skandA̱t|Ajyasya|uta|viṣṇO̍ iti||tEna̍|hanmi|sapatna̱m|durmarAyumiti̍# duḥ - marAyum|Eti|Enam|dadhAmi|niṛRu̍tyA̍ iti niḥ-RutyAḥ|upastha ityupa - sthE||BUḥ|Buvaḥ|suva̍ḥ|ucCu̍ṣma̍ ityut - śuṣmaḥ|agnE|yajamAnAya|Edhi|niśu̍ṣma̍ iti ni-śuṣmaḥ|aBidAsata̍ ityaBi̍ - dAsatE||agnE̱|dEvEddhEti̍ dEva# - iddha|manviddhEti manu# - iddha|mandrajihvEti̍ mandra-jihva|ama̍rtyasya|tE|hOtaḥ|mUrddhann|Eti̍|jiGarmi|rAyaḥ|pOṣA̍ya|suprajAstvAyEti̍# suprajAḥ - tvAya|suvIryAyEti̍# su - vIryAya|mana̍ḥ|asi|prAjApatyamiti̍# prAjA-patyam|manasA|mA|BUtEna̍|Eti̍|viśa|vAk|asi|aindrI|sapatnakṣayaṇIti̍# sapatna - kṣayaṇI|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: d yadvA skandA-dAjyasyOta̍ viṣṇO|tEna̍# hanmi sapatnaM̍ durmarAyumainaM̍ dadhAmi niṛRutyA̍ upasthE̱|BUr Buvaḥ suvarucCuṣmO̍ agnE yajamAnAyaidhi̍ niśuṣmO̍ aBidAsatE|agnE̍ dEvE̱ddha manviddha̍ mandrajihvA-ma̍rtyasya̍ tE hOtarmUrddhannA jiGarmi̍ rAyaspOṣAya̍ suprajAstvAya# suvIryAya̍ manO&si̍ prAjApatyaM manasA̍ mA BUtEnA *viśa̍ vAgasyaindrI̍ sapatnakṣaya̍ṇI̍ - [ ] 5

verses.padam: (Padam) vAcA|mA|indriyEṇa|Eti̍|viśa|vasantam|RutUnAm|prIṇAmi|saḥ|mA|prItaḥ|prIṇAtu|grIṣmam|RutUnAm|prIṇAmi|saḥ|mA|prItaḥ|prIṇAtu|varq.ṣA̍ ḥ|RutUnAm|prIṇAmi|tAḥ|mA|prItAḥ|prIṇantu|śarada̱m|RutUnAm|prIṇAmi|sA|mA|prItA|prIṇAtu|hEmantaśiśirAviti# hEmanta - śiśirau|RutUnAm|prIṇAmi|tau|mA|prItau|prIṇItAm|agnIṣOmayOrityagnI̍ - sOmayOḥ|aham|dEvayajyayEti̍# dEva- yajyayA̱|cakṣuṣmAn|BUyAsam|agnEḥ|aham|dEvayajyayEti̍# dEva - yajyayA̱|annAda ityanna̍ - adaḥ|BUyAsam|6 (50)
verses.samhita: vAcA mE̱ndriyEṇA *viśa̍ vasantamRutUnAM̍ prIṇAmi̍ sa mA̱ prItaḥ prIṇAtu̍ grIṣmamRutUnAM̍ prIṇAmi̍ sa mA̱ prItaḥ prIṇAtu̍ varq.ṣA RutUnAM̍ prIṇAmi̍ tA mA̱ prItAḥ prIṇantu̍ śaradamRutUnAM̍ prIṇAmi̍ sA mA̱ prItA prIṇAtu̍ hEmantaśiśirAvRutUnAM̍ prIṇAmi̍ tau mA̱ prItau prIṇItA-magnIṣOma̍yO-rahaM̍ dEvayajyayA̍ cakṣuṣmAn̍ BUyAsamagnErahaM dEvayajyayA̱&nnAdO̍ BUyAsaM̍ - [ ] 6

verses.padam: (Padam) dabdhiḥ|asi|ada̍bdhaḥ|BUyAsam|amum|daBEyam|agnIṣOma̍yOrityagnI̍ - sOmayOḥ|aham|dEvayajyayEti̍# dEva- yajyayA̱|vRutrahEti# vRutra - hA|BUyAsam|indrAgniyOritI̱ndra - agniyOḥ|aham|dEvayajyayEti# dEva - yajyayA̱|indriyAvI|annAda ityanna̍ - adaḥ|BUyAsam|indrasya|aham|dEvayajyayEti̍# dEva - yajyayA̱|indriyAvI|BUyAsam|mahEndrasyEti# mahA - indrasya|aham|dEvayajyayEti̍# dEva - yajyayA̱|jEmAna̱m|mahimAna̱m|gamEyam|agnEḥ|sviṣṭakRuta iti# sviṣṭa - kRutaḥ|aham|dEvayajyayEti̍# dEva - yajyayA̱|AyuṣmAn|yajñEna̍|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati - sthAm|gamEyam||7 (36) (riṣyA̱th-sapatnakṣayaṇya-nnAdO̍ BUyAsaṃq-ṣaṭtriṃ̍śacca)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: dabdhirasyada̍bdhO̍ BUyAsamamuM daBEya-magnIṣOma̍yO-rahaM̍ dEvayajyayA̍# vRutrahA BUyAsamindrAgniyOrahaM̍ dEvayajyayE̱ndriyAvya̍nnAdO̍ BUyAsamindra̍syA&haM̍ dEvayajyayE̱ndriyAvI̍ BUyAsaM̍ mahEndrasyA&haM dEvayajyayA̍# jEmAnaM̍ mahimAnaM̍ gamEyamagnEḥ sviṣṭakRutO&haM̍ dEvayajyayA̍ &&yuṣmAn.̍ yajñEna# pratiṣṭhAM gamEyaM||7̍ (riṣyA̱th-sapatnakṣayaṇya-nnAdO̍ BUyAsaṃq-ṣaṭtriṃ̍śacca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) agniḥ|mA|duriṣṭAditi̍ duḥ - iṣṭAt|pAtu|savitA|aGaśaṃsAdityaGa-śaṃqsAt|yaḥ|mE|anti̍|dUrE|arAtIyati̍|tam|EtEna̍|jEṣam|surU̍pavaṛṣavarṇa̍ iti surUpa̍ - varq.ṣavarṇE|Eti|ihi|imAn|BadrAn|duryAn̍|aBi|Eti̍|ihi|mAm|anu̍vratEtyanu̍-vratA|nIti̍|u|śIṛqṣAṇi̍|mRuḍhvam|iḍE̱|Eti̍|ihi|adi̍tE|Eti̍|ihi|sara̍svati|Eti̍|ihi|ranti̍ḥ|asi|rama̍tiḥ|asi|sUnarI̱|asi|juṣṭE̱|juṣṭi̱m|tE|aśIya|upa̍hUta̍ ityupa# - hUtE|upahavamityupa̍ - havam|8 (50)
verses.samhita: agnirmA duriṣṭAt̍ pAtu savitA&GaśaṃsAdyO̍ mE&nti# dUrE&rAtIyati̍ tamEtEna# jEṣaṃq surUpavaṛṣavarṇa̍ EhImAn BadrAn duryAṃ# aByEhi mAmanuvratA̍ nyu# śIrq.ṣAṇi# mRuḍhvamiḍa Ehyadita̍ Ehi sarasvatyEhi̍ rantirasi̍ ramatirasi̍ sUnaryasi̍ juṣṭE juṣṭiM̍ tE&śIyOpahUta̍ upahavaM - [ ] 8

verses.padam: (Padam) tE|aśIya|sA|mE|satyA|AśIrityA̱ - śIḥ|asya|yajñasya|BUyAt|arE̍ḍatA|mana̍sA|tat|śakEyam|yajñaḥ|diva̱m|rOhatu|yajñaḥ|diva̱m|gacCatu|yaḥ|dEvayAna̍ iti# dEva-yAnaḥ|panthA̱ḥ|tEna̍|yajñaḥ|dEvAn|apIti̍|Etu|asmAsu̍|indra̍ḥ|indriyam|dadhAtu|asmAn|rAya̍ḥ|uta|yajñAḥ|sacantAm|asmAsu̍|santu|Aśiṣa̍ ityA̱ - śiṣaḥ|sA|naḥ|priyA|supratU̱rtiriti̍# su - pratU̱rtiḥ|maGOnI̱|juṣṭiḥ|asi|juṣasva̍|naḥ|juṣṭA̱|naḥ|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tE&śIya̍ sA mE# satyA&&śIrasya yajñasya# BUyAdarEḍatA̍ manasA̍ tacCakEyaM̍ ~MyajñO divaṃ# rOhatu yajñO divaM̍ gacCatu yO dEvayAnaḥ̍ panthAstEna# yajñO dEvAṃ apyE̱tvasmAsvindra# indriyaM dadhAtvasmAnrAya̍# uta yajñAḥ sacantAmasmAsu̍# santvAśiṣaḥ sA naḥ̍ priyA supratU̱rtirmaGOnI juṣṭirasi̍ juṣasva# nO juṣṭA# nO - [ ] 9

verses.padam: (Padam) asi|juṣṭi̱m|tE|gamEyam|manaḥ|jyOti̍ḥ|juṣatAm|Ajya̱m|vicCi̍nnamiti̍ vi - Cinnam|yajñam|samiti|imam|dadhAtu|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|tanutAm|imam|naḥ|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|iha|mAdayantAm|braddhna̍|pinva̍sva|dada̍taḥ|mE|mA|kṣAyi|kurvataḥ|mE|mA|upEti̍|dasat|prajApa̍tEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|BAgaḥ|asi|UrjasvAn|paya̍svAn|prAṇApAnAviti̍# prAṇa-apAnau|mE|pAhi|samAnavyAnAviti# samAna - vyAnau|mE|pAhi|udAnavyAnAvityudAna̍ - vyAnau|mE|pAhi|akṣitaḥ|asi|akṣi̍tyai|tvA̍ ( )|mA|mE|kṣEṣṭhAḥ|amutra|amuṣminn̍|lOkE||10̍ (56)
verses.samhita: &si juṣṭiM̍ tE gamEyaM manO jyOtir̍ juṣatAmAjyaM ~MvicCinnaM̍ ~Myajñaṃ samimaM dadhAtu|bRuhaspati̍-stanutAmimannO̍ viśvE# dEvA iha mAdayantAM||braddhna̍ pinvasva̍ dadatO̍ mE mA kṣAyi̍ kurvatO mE mOpa# dasat prajApatEr̍ BAgO̱&syUrjasvAn̍ payasvAn̍ prAṇApAnau mE# pAhi samAnavyAnau mE# pAhyudAnavyAnau mE# pAhyakṣitO&syakṣi̍tyai̍ tvA ( ) mA mE̱ kṣEṣṭhA amutrAmuṣmin̍ ~MlOkE||10

verses.padam: (Padam) barqḥiṣaḥ|aham|dEvayajyayEti̍# dEva - yajyayA̱|prajAvAniti# prajA - vAn|BUyAsam|narAśaṃsasya|aham|dEvayajyayEti̍# dEva - yajyayA̱|paśumAniti# paśu - mAn|BUyAsam|agnEḥ|sviṣṭakRuta iti# sviṣṭa - kRutaḥ|aham|dEvayajyayEti̍# dEva - yajyayA̱|AyuṣmAn|yajñEna̍|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati - sthAm|gamEyam|agnEḥ|aham|ujjitimityut̍ - jitim|anu|uditi̍|jEṣam|sOma̍sya|aham|ujji̍timityut̍ - jitim|anu|uditi̍|jEṣam|agnEḥ|aham|ujji̍timityut-jitim|anu̍|uditi̍|jEṣam|agnIṣOma̍yOrityagnI̍ - sOmayOḥ|aham|ujji̍timityut̍ - jitim|anu|uditi̍|jEṣam|indrAgniyOritI̱ndra̍ - agniyOḥ|aham|ujjitimityut-jitim|anu̍|uditi̍|jEṣam|indra̍sya|aham|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: barqḥiṣO&haM dEvayajyayA̱̍ prajAvA̱n BUyAsaM narAśaṃsasyAhaM̍ dEvayajyayA̍# paśumAn BUyAsamagnEḥ̍ sviṣṭakRutO&haM̍ dEvayajyayA&&yu̍ṣmAn.̍ yajñEna# pratiṣṭhAM gamEyamagnEraha-mujji̍ti-manUjjE̍ṣaṃq̍ sOmasyAha̍ - mujjiti-manUjjE̍ṣamagnEraha-mujji̍ti-manUjjE̍ṣa-magnIṣOma̍yOraha-mujji̍ti-manUjjE̍ṣa-mindrAgniyOraha-mujji̍ti-manUjjE̍ṣa-mindra̍syAha-̍ [ ] 11

verses.padam: (Padam) ujjitimityut̍ - jitim|anu|uditi̍|jEṣam|mahEndrasyEti̍# mahA - indrasya|aham|ujji̍timityut-jitim|anu̍|uditi̍|jEṣam|agnEḥ|sviṣṭakRuta̍ iti# sviṣṭa - kRutaḥ|aham|ujji̍timityut̍ - jitim|anu|uditi̍|jEṣam|vAja̍sya|mA|prasavEnEti̍# pra - savEna|udgrABEṇEtyu̍t̍ - grABEṇa|uditi̍|agraBIt||atha̍|sapatnAn̍|indra̍ḥ|mE|nigrABEṇEti̍# ni - grABEṇa|adha̍rAn|akaḥ||udgrABamityu̍t̍ - grABam|ca|nigrABamiti# ni - grABam|ca|brahma|dEvAḥ|avIvRudhann||atha̍|sapatnAn̍|indrAgnI̍ itI̱ndra - agnI|mE|viṣUcInAn|vIti̍|asyatAm||Eti̍|imAḥ|agmann|Aśiṣa̍ ityA̱ - śiṣaḥ|dOha̍kAmA̍ iti dOha# - kAmAḥ|indravanta̍ itIndra-̍ vantaḥ|12 (50)
verses.samhita: mujjitimanUjjE̍ṣaM̍ mahEndrasyAhamujjiti-̍ manUjjEṣamagnEḥ̍ sviṣṭakRutO&ha̍ mujjiti-manUjjE̍ṣaM̍ ~MvAjasya̍ mA prasavEnO̱d grABEṇOdagraBIt|athA̍# sapatnAṃq indrO# mE nigrABEṇAdharAṃ̍ akaḥ||udgrABaM ca# nigrABaM ca brahma# dEvA avIvRudhann|athA̍# sapatnAnindrAgnI̍ mE# viṣUcInAn vyasyatAM||EmA̍ agmannAśiṣO̍ dOhakAmA̍ indravantO̍ - [ ] 12

verses.padam: (Padam) vanAmahE|dhukṣImahi|prajAmiti̍# pra-jAm|iṣa̱m||rOhitEna|tvA|agniḥ|dEvatA̱m|gamayatu|hari̍ByAmiti̍ hari# - ByAm|tvA|indraḥ|dEvatA̱m|gamayatu|Eta̍śEna|tvA|sUrya̍ḥ|dEvatA̱m|gamayatu|vIti̍|tE|mu~jcAmi|raśanAḥ|vIti̍|raśmIn|vIti̍|yOktrA̱|yAni̍|paricarta̍nAnIti̍# pari - cartanAni|dhattAt|asmAsu̍|dravi̍ṇam|yat|ca|Badram|prEti̍|naḥ|brUtAt|BAgadhAniti̍# BAga - dhAn|dEvatAsu||viṣṇO̱ḥ|śam~MyOriti̍# śaM - yOḥ|aham|dEvayajyayEti# dEva-yajyayA̱|yajñEna|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati - sthAm|gamEyam|sOmasya|aham|dEvayajyayEti̍# dEva - yajyayA̱|13 (50)
verses.samhita: vanAmahE dhukṣImahi# prajAmiṣa̱M||rOhitEna̍ tvA&gnir dEvatA̱M gamayatu hariByAM̍ tvEndrO# dEvatA̱M gamayatvEtaśEna̍ tvA sUryO# dEvatA̱M gamayatu vi tE# mu~jcAmi raśanA vi raśmIn vi yOktrA yAni# paricartanAni̍ dhattAdasmAsu draviṇaM̍ ~Myacca# BadraM pra ṇO̱ brUtAd-BAgadhAn dEvatAsu||viṣṇO̱ḥ̍ śaM~MyOrahaM dEvayajyayA̍# yajñEna# pratiṣṭhAM gamEyaṃq̍ sOmasyAhaM̍ dEvayajyayA̍# - [ ] 13

verses.padam: (Padam) surEtA iti# su - rEtA̱ḥ|rEtaḥ|dhiṣIya|tvaṣṭu̍ḥ|aham|dEvayajyayEti̍# dEva-yajyayA̱|paśUnAm|rUpam|puṣEyam|dEvAnA̱m|patnI̱ḥ|agniḥ|gRuhapatiriti̍# gRuha - patiḥ|yajñasya|mithunam|tayO̱ḥ|aham|dEvayajyayEti̍# dEva - yajyayA̱|mithunEna|prEti̍|BUyAsam|vEdaḥ|asi|vitti̍ḥ|asi|vidEya̍|karma̍|asi|karuṇa̱m|asi|kriyAsa̱m|saniḥ|asi|sanitA|asi|sanEya̱m|GRutava̍ntamiti̍# GRuta-vantam|kulAyina̱m|rAyaḥ|pOṣa̱m|sahasriṇa̱m|vEdaḥ|dadAtu|vAjina̱m||14 (44) (indrasyAha-mindra̍vantaḥ-sOma̍syAhaM̍ dEvayajyayA-catu̍ścatvAriṃśacca)(A4)̍
verses.samhita: surEtA rEtO# dhiṣIya tvaṣṭurahaM̍ dEvayajyayA̍# paśUnAṃ rUpaM puṣEyaM̍ dEvAnAM patnIragnir̍ gRuhapatir̍ yajñasya# mithunaM tayOrahaM̍ dEvayajyayA̍# mithunEna praBUyAsaM̍ ~MvEdO&si̍ vittirasi̍ vidEya karmA&si̍ karuṇamasi̍ kriyAsaṃ# sanirasi̍ sanitA&si# sanEyaM̍ GRutavantaM̍ kulAyinaṃ# rAyaspOṣaṃ# sahasriṇaM̍ ~MvEdO dadAtu̍ vAjina̱M||14 (indrasyAha-mindra̍vantaḥ-sOma̍syAhaM̍ dEvayajyayA-catu̍ścatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) Eti|pyAyatAm|dhruvA|GRutEna̍|yajñaM̍ ~Myajñamiti̍# yajñam - yajñam|pratIti|dEvayadBya̍ iti# dEvayat - Byaḥ||sUryAyA̱ḥ|Udhaḥ|adi̍tyAḥ|upastha̍ ityupa - sthE|urudhArEtyuru - dhArA|pRuthivI|yajñE|asminn||prajApatEriti̍# prajA-patEḥ|viBAniti# vi-BAn|nAma|lOkaḥ|tasminn̍|tvA|dadhAmi|saha|yaja̍mAnEna|sat|asi|sat|mE|BUyAḥ|sarva̱m|asi|sarva̱m|mE|BUyAḥ|pUrṇam|asi|pUrṇam|mE|BUyAḥ|akṣi̍tam|asi|mA|mE|kṣaṣṭhAḥ|prAcyA̱m|diśi|dEvAḥ|Rutvija̍ḥ|mArjayantAm|dakṣi̍ṇAyAm|15̍ (50)
verses.samhita: A pyAyatAM̍ dhruvA GRutEna# yajñaM~MyajñaM̍ prati# dEvayadByaḥ|sUryAyA̍ UdhO&dityA̍ upastha# urudhArA̍ pRuthivI yajñE asminn||prajApatEr̍ viBAnnAma# lOkastasmiṅstvA̍ dadhAmi saha yajamAnEna̍ sadasi̍ sanmE# BUyAḥ sarvamasi̍ sarvaM̍ mE BUyAḥ pUrṇamasi̍ pUrṇaM mE# BUyA akṣitamasi̍ mA mE̱ kṣEṣṭhAḥ prAcyA̱M diśi dEvA RutvijO# mArjayantAM dakṣiṇAyAM-̍ [ ] 15

verses.padam: (Padam) diśi|mAsA̱ḥ|pitaraḥ|mArjayantAm|pratIcyA̱m|diśi|gRuhAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|mArjayantAm|udI̱cyAm|diśi|Apa̍ḥ|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|vanaspata̍yaḥ|mArjayantAm|Ud^^rdhvAyA̱m|diśi|yajñaḥ|sam~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|yajñapatiriti̍# yajña - patiḥ|mArjayantAm|viṣṇO̱ḥ|kramaḥ|asi|aBimAtihEtya̍BimAti̍ - hA|gAyatrEṇa|Canda̍sA|pRuthivIm|anu̍|vIti̍|kramE|nirBa̍kta̍ iti niḥ - Baktaḥ|saḥ|yam|dviṣmaḥ|viṣṇO̱ḥ|kramaḥ|asi|aBiśastihEtya̍Biśasti̍ - hA|traiṣṭuBEna|Canda̍sA|antari̍kṣam|anu̍|vIti̍|kramE|nirBa̍kta̍ iti niḥ-Baktaḥ|saḥ|yam|dviṣmaḥ|viṣṇO̱ḥ ( )|kramaḥ|asi|arAtIyataḥ|hantA|jAga̍tEna|Canda̍sA|diva̱m|anu̍|vIti̍|kramE|nirBa̍kta̍ iti niḥ - Baktaḥ|saḥ|yam|dviṣmaḥ|viṣṇA̱ḥ|kramaḥ|asi|śatrUyata̍ iti# śatru - yataḥ|hantA|AnuṣṭuBEnEtyAnu̍# - sthuBEna|CandasA|diśa̍ḥ|anu̍|vIti̍|kramE|nirBa̍kta̍ iti niḥ - Baktaḥ|saḥ|yam|dviṣmaḥ||16 (79) (dakṣiṇAyA̍ - mantarikṣamanu̍ vi kramE̍ nirBaktaḥ̍ sa yaM dviṣmO viṣṇO- rEkAnna triṃqśacca)̍ (A5)
verses.samhita: diśi mAsA̱ḥ pitarO# mArjayantAM pratIcyA̱M diśi gRuhAḥ paśavO# mArjayantAmudI̱cyAM diśyApa OṣadhayO̍ vanaspatayO̍ mArjayantAmUrddhvAyA̱M diśi yajñaḥ saM~MvathsarO̍ yajñapatir̍ mArjayantAM ~MviṣṇOḥ kramO̱&syaBimAtihA gAyatrEṇa̍ CandasA̍ pRuthivImanu vi kramE̍ nirBaktaḥ̍ sa yaM dviṣmO viṣṇOḥ kramO̱&syaBiśastihA traiṣṭuBEna̍ CandasA̍ &ntarikṣamanu̍ vi kramE̍ nirBaktaḥ̍ sa yaM dviṣmO viṣṇOḥ kramO̱&syarAtIyatO hantA jAgatEna̍ CandasA̍ divamanu vi kramE̍ nirBaktaḥ̍ sa yaM dviṣmO viṣṇOḥ kramO&si̍ śatrUyatO hantA&&nuṣṭuBEna̍ CandasA̍ diśO&nu vi kramE̍ nirBaktaḥ̍ sa yaM dviṣmaḥ||16 (dakṣiṇAyA̍ - mantarikṣamanu̍ vi kramE̍ nirBaktaḥ̍ sa yaM dviṣmO viṣṇO- rEkAnnatriṃqśacca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) aganma|suva̍ḥ|suva̍ḥ|aganma|sadRuMśa̍ iti# saM-dRuśaḥ|tE|mA|Cithsi|yat|tE|tapa̍ḥ|tasmai̱|tE|mA|Eti̍|vRukṣi|suBUriti̍# su - BUḥ|asi|śrEṣṭhaḥ|raśmInAm|Ayud^^rdhA̍ ityAyuḥ̍ - dhAḥ|asi|Ayuḥ|mE|dhEhi|varcOdhA̍ iti# varcaḥ -dhAḥ|asi|varcaḥ|mayi̍|dhahi|idam|aham|amum|BrAtRu̍vyam|AByaḥ|digBya̍ iti# dik - Byaḥ|asyai|divaḥ|asmAt|antarikṣAt|asyai|pRuthivyAḥ|asmAt|annAdyAditya̍nna̍ -adyA̱t|niriti|BajAmi|nirBa̍kta̍ iti niḥ - Baktaḥ|saḥ|yam|dviṣmaḥ||17 (50)
verses.samhita: aganma̍ suvaḥ suvaraganma̍ sandRuśastE̍ mA Cithsi̍ yattE tapastasmai# tE mA&& vRukṣi̍ suBUrasi̍ śrEṣṭhO# raśmInAmAyurddhA̍ asyAyurmE̍ dhEhi varcOdhA asi̍ varcO mayi# dhEhIdamahamamuM BrAtRuvyamAByO̍ digByO̱&syai divO̱&smAdantarikṣAdasyai̍ pRuthivyA̍ asmAdannAdyAnnirBajAmi̍ nirBaktaḥ̍ sa yaM dviṣmaḥ||17

verses.padam: (Padam) samiti|jyOti̍ṣA|aBUvam|aindrIm|AvRutamityA̱̍ - vRuta̱m|anvAvarta̍ ityanu̍ - AvartE|samiti̍|aham|prajayEti̍# pra-jayA̱|samiti|mayA̱|prajEti̍# pra - jA|samiti|aham|rAyaḥ|pOṣE̍ṇa|samiti̍|mayA̱|rAyaḥ|pOṣa̍ḥ|sami̍ddha̍ iti sam - iddhaḥ|agnE|mE|dIdihi|samEddhEti# sam - EddhA|tE|agnE|dIdyAsam|vasumAniti̍ vasu# - mAn|yajñaḥ|vasIyAn|BUyAsam|agnE̱|AyUṃ̍ṣi|pavasE|Eti̍|suva|Urja̱m|iṣa̱m|ca|naḥ||ArE|bAdhasva|ducCunA̱m||agnE̱|pava̍sva|svapA̍ iti# su-apA̱ḥ|asmE iti|varca̍ḥ|suvIryamiti̍# su-vIrya̱m||18 (50)
verses.samhita: saM jyOtiṣA&BUvamaindrI-mAvRuta̍-manvAva̍rtE̍ samahaM prajayA saM mayA̱ prajA samahaṃ rAyaspOṣEṇa̍ saM mayA# rAyaspOṣaḥ samiddhO̍ agnE mE dIdihi samEddhA tE# agnE dIdyAsaM ~MvasumAn.̍ yajñO vasIyAn̍ BUyAsamagna AyUṃṣi̍ pavasa A suvOrjamiṣaM̍ ca naḥ|ArE bAdhasva̍ ducCunA̱M||agnE pavasva̍ svapA# asmE varcaḥ̍ suvIrya̱M|18

verses.padam: (Padam) dadhat|pOṣa̱m|rayim|mayi̍||agnE̱|gRuhapata̍ iti# gRuha - patE|sugRuhapatiriti# su - gRuhapatiḥ|aham|tvayA̱|gRuhapatinEti̍# gRuha - patinA|BUyAsam|sugRuhapatiriti# su – gRuhapatiḥ|mayA̱|tvam|gRuhapatinEti̍# gRuha - patinA|BUyAḥ|śatam|himA̱ḥ|tAm|AśiṣamityA̱ - śiṣa̱m|Eti|śAsE|tanta̍vE|jyOti̍ṣmatIm|tAm|AśiṣamityA̱̍ - śiṣa̱m|Eti|śAsE|amuṣmai̱|jyOti̍ṣmatIm|kaḥ|tvA|yunakti|saḥ|tvA|vIti̍|mu~jcatu|agnE̱|vratapata̍ iti# vrata - patE|vratam|acAriṣam|tat|aśakam|tat|mE|arAdhi|yajñaḥ|baBUva|saḥ|Eti|19̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dadhatpOṣaṃ# rayiM mayi|agnE̍# gRuhapatE sugRuhapatirahaM tvayA# gRuhapatinA̍ BUyAsaṃ sugRuhapatirmayA tvaM gRuhapatinA̍ BUyAḥ śataṃ himAstAmAśiṣamA śAsE̍ tantavE̍ jyOtiṣmatIM̍ tAmAśiṣamA śAsE&muṣmai̍ jyOtiṣmatIM̍ kastvA# yunakti sa tvA vimu~jcatvagnE̱̍ vratapatE vratamacAriṣaM̍ tadaśakaM̍ tanmE&rAdhi̍ yajñO baBUva̍ sa A - [ ] 19

verses.padam: (Padam) baBUva|saḥ|prEti|jajñE|saḥ|vAvRudhE||saḥ|dEvAnA̱m|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|baBUva|saḥ|asmAn|adhipatInityadhi̍# - patIn|karOtu|vayam|syAma|patayaḥ|rayIṇAm||gOmAniti̍ gO - mAn|agnE|avimAnityavi̍# - mAn|aśvI|yajñaḥ|nRuvathsaKEti# nRuvat - saKA|sada̱m|it|apramRuṣya ityapra̍ - mRuṣyaḥ||iḍAvAnitIḍA̱̍ - vAn|Eṣaḥ|asura|prajAvAniti# prajA - vAn|dIrGaḥ|rayiḥ|pRuthubuddhna iti# pRuthu - buddhnaḥ|saBAvAniti# saBA - vAn||20 (35) (dviṣmaḥ-suvIryaṃq-sa A-pa~jcatriṃśacca)̍ (A6)
verses.samhita: baBUva̍ sa prajajñE̍ sa vAvRudhE|sa̍ dEvAnAmadhipatir̍ baBUva sO asmAṃ adhipatIn̍ karOtu vayaṅ syAma̍ patayO̍ rayIṇAM||gOmAṃ# agnE&vimAṃ̍ aśvI yajñO nRuvathsaKA̍ sadamidapramRuṣyaḥ|iḍA̍vAṃ̍ EṣO asura̍ prajAvA̱n dIrGO rayiḥ pRuthubuddhnaḥ̍ saBAvAn||20̍ (dviṣmaḥ-suvIryaṃq-sa A-pa~jcatriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) yathA̱|vai|samRutasOmA iti# samRuta - sOmAḥ|Evam|vai|EtE|samRutayajñA iti# samRuta - yajñAḥ|yat|darq.śapUrṇamAsAviti# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsau|kasya|vA|aha̍|dEvAḥ|yajñam|AgacCantItyA̱̍ - gacCanti|kasya̍|vA|na|bahUnAm|yaja̍mAnAnAm|yaḥ|vai|dEvatA̱ḥ|pUrva̍ḥ|parigRuhṇAtIti̍# pari - gRuhṇAti|saḥ|EnAḥ|śvaḥ|BUtE|yajatE|Etat|vai|dEvAnA̱m|Ayata̍namityA̱̍ - yatanam|yat|AhavanIya̍ ityA̱ - havanIyaḥ|antarA|agnI̍ iti|paśUnAm|gAṛha̍patya̍ iti gAṛha# - patyaḥ|manuṣyAṇAm|anvAhAryapaca̍na̍ ityanvAhArya̍ - pacanaḥ|pitRuṇAm|agnim|gRuhṇAti|svE|Eva|Ayata̍na̍ ityA̱ - yatanE|dEvatA̱ḥ|parIti̍|21̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yathA vai samRutasOmA̍ EvaM ~MvA EtE samRutayajñA̍ yaddaṛśapUrṇamAsau̍ kasya vA&ha# dEvA yajñamAgacCanti̍ kasya# vA na bahUnAM̍ ~MyajamAnAnAM̍ ~MyO vai dEvatAḥ pUrvaḥ̍ parigRuhṇAti sa EnAḥ̍ śvO BUtE yajata̍ Etadvai dEvAnA-mAyata̍naM̍ ~MyadAhavanIyO̱&ntarA&gnI̍ paśUnAM̍ gAṛhapatyO̍ manuṣyAṇA-manvAhAryapaca̍naḥ̍ pitRuṇAmagniM gRuhṇAti̍ sva EvAyatanE̍ dEvatAḥ pari# - [ ] 21

verses.padam: (Padam) gRuhṇAti|tAḥ|śvaḥ|BUtE|yajatE|vratEna|vai|mEddhya̍ḥ|agniḥ|vratapa̍tiriti̍# vrata - patiḥ|brAhmaṇaḥ|vrataBRuditi# vrata - BRut|vratam|upaiṣyannityupa̍ - Eṣyann|brUyAt|agnE̱|vratapata iti# vrata - patE|vratam|cariṣyAmi|iti|agniḥ|vai|dEvAnA̱m|vratapa̍tiriti̍# vrata - patiḥ|tasmai̱|Eva|pratiprOcyEti# prati - prOcya|vratam|Eti̍|laBatE|barqḥiṣA̱|pUrṇamA̍sa̍ iti# pUrṇa - mAsE|vratam|upEti|Eti|vathsaiḥ|amAvAsyA̍yAmitya̍mA̍ - vAsyAyAm|Etat|hi|EtayO̱ḥ|Ayata̍namityA̱̍ - yatanam|upastIrya̍ ityupa̍ - stIryaḥ|pUrva̍ḥ|ca|agniḥ|apa̍raḥ|ca|iti̍|Ahuḥ|manuṣyA̱ḥ|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: gRuhṇAti tAḥ śvO BUtE yajatE̍ vratEna vai mEddhyO -&gnir vratapatir̍ brAhmaṇO vrataBRud-vrata-mu̍paiṣyan̍ brUyAdagnE̱̍ vratapatE vrataM cariṣyAmItyagnir̍ vai dEvAnA̱M ~MvratapatistasmA̍# Eva pratiprOcya̍# vratamA laBatE̍ barqḥiṣA# pUrṇamAsE̍ vratamupaiti̍ vathsairamAvAsyA̍yAmEtaddhyE̍tayO̍-rAyata̍namupastIryaḥ̍ pUrvaścAgnirapa̍raścEtyA̍hur̍ manuṣyA# - [ ] 22

verses.padam: (Padam) it|nu|vA|upastIrṇamiyupa̍# - stIrṇam|icCanti|kim|u|dEvAḥ|yEṣA̱m|navA̍vasAnamiti̍ nava# - avasAnam|upEti|asminn|śvaḥ|yakṣyamA̍ṇE|dEvatA̱ḥ|vasanti|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|agnim|upastRuṇAtItyu̍pa̍ - stRuṇAti|yaja̍mAnEna|grAmyAḥ|ca|paśava̍ḥ|avaruddhyA̍ ityava-ruddhyA̱ḥ|AraṇyAḥ|ca|iti̍|Ahuḥ|yat|grAmyAn|upavasatItyu̍pa̍ - vasati|tEna̍|grAmyAn|avEti̍|rundhE|yat|Araṇyasya̍|aśnAti̍|tEna̍|AraṇyAn|yat|anA̱śvAn|upavasEdityu̍pa̍ - vasE̱t|pitRudEvatya# iti# pitRu - dEvatyaḥ|syAt|Araṇyasya̍|aśnAti|indriyam|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: innvA upastIrṇa-micCanti̍ kimu# dEvA yEṣAM navAvasAna-mupA̱smi~jCvO̍ yakṣyamAṇE̍ dEvatA# vasanti ya EvaM ~MvidvAnagni-mupastRuṇAti̍ yajamAnEna̍ grAmyAśca# paśavO&varuddhyA̍# AraṇyAścEtyAhur̍ yad grAmyAnupavasa̍ti̍ tEna# grAmyAnava# rundhE yadAraṇyasyAś~ja̍0078;ti̍ tEnAraṇyAn.̍ yadanA̱śvAnupavasE̱t pitRudEvatyaḥ̍ syAdAraṇyasyA̱-ś~jAtIndriyaM - [ ] 23

verses.padam: (Padam) vai|Araṇyam|indriyam|Eva|Atmann|dhattE|yat|anA̱śvAn|upavasEdityupa̍ - vasE̱t|kṣOdhukaḥ|syAt|yat|aśnIyAt|rudraḥ|asya|paśUn|aBIti̍|manyEta|apaḥ|aśnAti|tat|na|iva|aśitam|na|iva|ana̍śitam|na|kṣOdhu̍kaḥ|Bava̍ti|na|asya|rudraḥ|paśUn|aBIti̍|manyatE|vajra̍ḥ|vai|yajñaḥ|kṣut|Kalu̍|vai|manuṣya̍sya|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ|yat|anA̱śvAn|upavasatItyu̍pa-vasa̍ti|vajrE̍ṇa|Eva|sAkṣAditi̍# sa-akṣAt ( )|kṣudha̱m|BrAtRuvyam|hanti||24̍ (53) (pari-manuṣyA̍-indriyaṃ-sAkṣAt-trIṇi̍# ca) (A7)
verses.samhita: ~MvA Araṇyami̍ndriyamEvA&&tman̍ dhattE̍ yadanA̱śvAnupavasEt kṣOdhukaḥ̍ syAdyadaś~jIyAdru-drO̱&sya̍ paśUnaBi manyEtA&pO̱&ś~jAti̍ tannEvAśitaM̍ nEvA&naśitaM̍ na kṣOdhukO̍ Bavati̍ nAsya# rudraḥ paśUnaBi manyatE̍ vajrO vai yajñaḥ kṣut Kalu vai manuṣya̍sya̍ BrAtRuvyO̍ yadanA̱&śvAnupavasati̍ vajrEṇaiva̍ sAkṣAt ( ) kṣudhaM BrAtRuvyaṃ̍ hanti||24

verses.padam: (Padam) yaḥ|vai|śraddhAmiti# śrat - dhAm|anAraByEtyanA̱̍ - raBya|yajñEna|yaja̍tE|na|asya|iṣṭAya̍|śrat|dadhatE|apaḥ|prEti̍|nayati|śraddhEti̍# śrat - dhA|vai|Apaḥ|śraddhAmiti̍# śrat - dhAm|Eva|AraByEtyA̱ - raBya|yajñEna̍|yajatE|uBayE̱|asya|dEvamanuṣyA̍ iti# dEva - manuṣyAḥ|iṣṭAya|śrat|dadhatE|tat|Ahuḥ|atIti̍|vai|EtAḥ|vartra̱m|nEdanti|atIti̍|vAca̱m|mana̍ḥ|vAva|EtAḥ|na|atIti̍|nEdanti|iti̍|mana̍sA|prEti̍|nayati|iyam|vai|mana̍ḥ|25̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yO vai śraddhAmanAraBya̍ yajñEna yajatE̍ nAsyEṣṭAya śraddadhatE&paḥ̍ pra ṇayati̍ śraddhA vA Apaḥ̍ śraddhAmEvA&&raBya# yajñEna# yajata uBayE̱&sya dEvamanuṣyA iṣṭAya śraddadhatE̍ tadAhurati̍ vA EtA vartraM̍ nEdantyati vAcaM manO vAvaitA nAti# nEdantIti manasA̍ pra ṇayatIyaM̍ ~Mvai manO - [ ] 25

verses.padam: (Padam) anayA̱|Eva|EnAḥ|prEti|nayati|aska̍nnahavirityaska̍nna̍ - haviḥ|Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|yajñAyudhAnIti̍# yajña - AyudhAni|samiti̍|Barati|yajñaḥ|vai|yajñAyudhAnIti̍# yajña - AyudhAni|yajñam|Eva|tat|samiti̍|Barati|yat|Eka̍mEkamityEka̱m̍ - Ekam|saBaMrEditi# saM-BarE̱t|pitRudEvatyAnIti̍# pitRu - dEvatyAni|syuḥ|yat|saha|sarvA̍ṇi|mAnuṣAṇi̍|dvEdvE̍ iti dvE - dvE|samiti|Barati|yAjyAnuvAkya̍yOriti̍# yAjyA - anuvAkyayOḥ|Eva|rUpam|karOti|athO̍ iti|mithunam|Eva|yaḥ|vai|daśa̍|yajñAyudhAnIti̍# yajña - AyudhAni|vEda̍|muKataḥ|asya|yajñaḥ|kalpatE|sPyaḥ|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: &nayaivainAḥ pra ṇayatya-ska̍nnahavir̍ Bavati ya EvaM ~MvEda# yajñAyudhAni saM Barati̍ yajñO vai yajñAyudhAni̍# yajñamEva tathsaM Barati̍ yadEkamEkaṃ̍ saMBarE̱t-pitRudEvatyAni̍ syuryath saha sarvAṇi̍ mAnuṣAṇi dvEdvE saMBarati̍ yAjyAnuvAkyayOrEva̍ rUpaM karOtyathO̍# mithunamEvayO vai daśa# yajñAyudhAni vEda# muKatO̱&sya yajñaḥ kalpatE̍ sPyaḥ- [ ] 26

verses.padam: (Padam) ca|kapAlAni|ca|agnihOtrahavaṇItya̍gnihOtra̍ - havanI|ca|śUrpa̱m|ca|kRuṣṇAjinamiti̍# kRuṣṇa - ajinam|ca|śamyA̱|ca|ulUKalam|ca|musa̍lam|ca|dRuṣat|ca|upa̍lA|ca|EtAni̍|vai|daśa̍|yajñAyudhAnIti̍# yajña - AyudhAni|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|muKataḥ|asya|yajñaḥ|kalpatE|yaḥ|vai|dEvEBya̍ḥ|pratiprOcyEti̍# prati - prOcya|yajñEna̍|yaja̍tE|juṣantE̱|asya|dEvAḥ|havyam|haviḥ|nirupyamA̍ṇamiti̍# niḥ - upyamAnam|aBIti̍|mantrayEta|agnim|hOtA̍ram|iha|tam|huvE|iti̍|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ca# kapAlAni̍ cAgnihOtrahavaṇI̍ ca śUrpaM̍ ca kRuṣṇAjinaM ca śamyA# cOlUKalaM̍ ca musalaM̍ ca dRuṣaccOpalA̍ caitAni vai daśa# yajñAyudhAni ya EvaM ~MvEda# muKatO̱&sya yajñaḥ kalpatE̍ yO vai dEvEByaḥ̍ pratiprOcya# yajñEna yajatE̍ juṣantE̱&sya dEvA havyaṃ havir nirupyamA̍ṇamaBi̍ mantrayEtA&gniṃ̍ hOtAramiha̍ taṃ huva̍ iti# - [ ] 27

verses.padam: (Padam) dEvEByaḥ|Eva|pratiprOcyEti̍# prati - prOcya|yajñEna̍|yajatE|juṣantE̱|asya|dEvAḥ|havyam|Eṣaḥ|vai|yajñasya̍|graha̍ḥ|gRuhItvA|Eva|yajñEna̍|yajatE|tat|uditvA|vAca̱m|yacCati|yajñasya̍|dhRutyai̱|athO̍ iti|mana̍sA|vai|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|yajñam|atanuta|manasA|Eva|tat|yajñam|tanutE|rakṣa̍sAm|ana̍nvavacArAyEtyana̍nu-avacArAya|yaḥ|vai|yajñam|yOgE̱|Aga̍ta̍ ityA - gatE|yunakti|yu~gktE|yu~jjAnEṣu̍|kaḥ|tvA|yunakti|saḥ|tvA|yunaktu̍ ( )|iti|Aha|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|vai|kaḥ|prajApatinEti̍# prajA - patinA|Eva|Enam|yunakti|yu~gktE|yu~jjAnEṣu||28̍ (61)
verses.samhita: dEvEBya# Eva pratiprOcya̍# yajñEna# yajatE juṣantE̱&sya dEvA havyamEṣa vai yajñasya grahO# gRuhItvaiva yajñEna# yajatE taduditvA̍ vAcaM̍ ~MyacCati yajñasya dhRutyA athO manasA̍ vai prajApatir̍ yajñamatanuta̍ manasaiva̍ tad-yajñaM tanutE̍ rakṣasA-mana̍nvavacArAya̍ yO vai yajñaM ~MyOga AgatE̍ yunakti# yu~gktE yu~jjAnEṣu̍ kastvA# yunakti sa tvA# yunaktvi-( ) -tyAha̍ prajApatir̍ vai kaḥ prajApatinaivaina̍M̍ ~Myunakti yu~gktE yu~jjAnEṣu̍||28̍

verses.padam: (Padam) prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|yajñAn|asRujata|agnihOtramityagni̍ - hOtram|ca|agniṣṭOmamityagni̍ - stOmam|ca|paurṇamAsImiti# paurṇa - mAsIm|ca|ukthya̱m|ca|amAvAsyAmitya̍mA-vAsyA̱m|ca|atirAtramitya̍ti̍ - rAtram|ca|tAn|uditi|amimIta|yAva̍t|agnihOtramitya̍gni̍ - hOtram|AsI̱t|tAvAn|agniṣṭOma̍ ityagni̍ - stOmaḥ|yAvatI|paurṇamAsIti̍# paurṇa - mAsI|tAvAn|ukthya̍ḥ|yAva̍tI|amAvAsyEtya̍mA̍ - vAsyA̱|tAvAn|atirAtra̍ ityati-rAtraḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|agnihOtramitya̍gni̍ - hOtram|juhOti|yAva̍t|agniṣṭOmEnEtya̍gni̍ - stOmEna|upApnOtItyu̍pa̍ - ApnOti|tAva̍t|upEti̍|ApnOti|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|paurṇamAsImiti̍# paurṇa - mAsIm|yajatE|yAva̍t|ukthyE̍na|upApnOtItyu̍pa̍ - ApnOti|29̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajApatir̍ yajñAnasRujatA-gnihOtraM̍ cA̱gniṣṭOmaM ca# paurṇamAsIM cOkthyaM̍ cAmAvAsyA̱M cAtirAtraM ca tAnudamimIta̍ yAvadagnihOtra-mAsIt̍ tAvAnagniṣṭOmO̍ yAvatI̍ paurṇamAsI tAvAnukthyO̍# yAvatyamAvAsyA̍# tAvAnatirAtrO̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAnagnihOtraM̍ juhOti yAvadagniṣṭOmEnO̍# pApnOti tAvadupA̱&&pnOti ya EvaM ~MvidvAn pau̱rṇamAsIM ~MyajatE̍ yAvadukthyE̍nOpApnOti̍ - [ ] 29

verses.padam: (Padam) tAvat|upEti̍|ApnOti|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|amAvAsyA̍mitya̍mA̍ - vAsyA̱m|yajatE|yAva̍t|atirAtrEṇEtya̍ti̍ - rAtrEṇa|upApnOtItyu̍pa̍ - ApnOti|tAva̍t|upEti̍|ApnOti|paramEṣṭhina̍ḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yajñaḥ|agrE̱|AsIt|tEna̍|saḥ|paramAm|kAṣṭhA̱m|agacCat|tEna̍|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|niravAsAyayaditi̍# niḥ - avAsAyayat|tEna̍|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|paramAm|kAṣṭhA̱m|agacCat|tEna|indra̱m|niravA̍sAyayaditi̍# niḥ-avAsAyayat|tEna̍|indra̍ḥ|paramAm|kAṣṭhA̱m|agacCat|tEna̍|agnIṣOmAvityagnI̍ - sOmau̱|niravAsAyayaditi̍# niḥ - avAsAyayat|tEna̍|agnIṣOmAvityagnI̍ - sOmau̱|paramAm|kAṣṭhA̱m|agacCatAm|yaḥ|30 (50)
verses.samhita: tAvadupA̱&&pnOti ya EvaM ~MvidvAnamAvAsyA̱M̍ ~MyajatE̍ yAvadatirAtrEṇO̍pApnOti̍ tAvadupA̱&&pnOti paramEṣṭhinO vA Eṣa yajñO&gra# AsIt tEna sa paramAM̍ kAṣṭhAmagacCat̍ tEna# prajApatiM̍ niravAsAyayat̍ tEna# prajApatiḥ̍ paramAM kAṣṭhAmagacCat̍ tEnEndraM̍ niravAsAyayat̍ tEnEndraḥ̍ paramAM kAṣṭhAmagacCat̍ tEnA&gnIṣOmau# niravAsAyayat̍ tEnAgnIṣOmau# paramAM kAṣṭhAmagacCatAM̍ ~Mya - [ ] 30

verses.padam: (Padam) Evam|vidvAn|darq.śapUrṇamAsAviti# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsau|yajatE|paramAm|Eva|kAṣṭhA̱m|gacCati|yaḥ|vai|prajA̍tEnEti̍ pra - jAtEna|yajñEna|yaja̍tE|prEti̍|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|mithunaiḥ|jAyatE|dvAdaśa|mAsA̱ḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|dvAdaśa|dvandvAnIti̍# dvaM - dvAni|darq.śapUrṇamAsayOriti̍# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsayO̱ḥ|tAni|sapAMdyAnIti̍# saM- pAdyAni|iti̍|Ahuḥ|vathsam|ca|upAvasRujatItyu̍pa̍ - avasRujati|uKAm|ca|adhIti̍|śrayati|avEti̍|ca|hanti̍|dRuṣadau̱|ca|samAhantIti̍# saM - Ahanti|adhIti̍|ca|vapa̍tE|kapAlA̍ni|ca|upEti̍|dadhAti|purOḍAśa̱m|ca|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: EvaM ~MvidvAn daṛśapUrṇamAsau̍ yajatE̍ paramAmEva kAṣṭhA̱M gacCati yO vai prajAtEna̍ yajñEna yajatE̍ pra prajayA# paśuBir̍ mithunair jAyatE̍ dvAdaśa̍ mAsA̱ḥ saM~MvathsarO dvAdaśa̍ dvandvAni# daṛśapUrṇamAsayOstAni# saMpAdyAnItyAhur̍ vathsaM cOpAvasRujatyuKAM̍ cAdhi# śrayatyava# ca hanti# dRuṣadau# ca samAhantyadhi# ca vapatE̍ kapAlAni̍ cOpa# dadhAti purOḍAśaM̍ - [ ] 31

verses.padam: (Padam) adhiśrayatItyadhi̍ - śrayati|Ajya̱m|ca|stabaMqyajuriti̍# staMba - yajuḥ|ca|harati|aBIti̍|ca|gRuhṇAti|vEdi̱m|ca|parigRuhṇAtIti̍# pari - gRuhṇAti|patnI̱m|ca|samiti̍|nahyati|prOkṣa̍ṇIriti̍# pra - ukṣaṇIḥ|ca|AsAdayatItyA̱̍ - sAdayati|Ajya̱m|ca|EtAni̍|vai|dvAda̍śa|dvandvAnIti̍# dvaM - dvAni|darq.śapUrṇamAsayAriti̍# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsayO̱ḥ|tAni|yaḥ|Evam|sapAMdyEti̍# saM - pAdya|yaja̍tE|prajA̍tEnEti̍ pra - jAtEna|Eva|yajñEna|yajatE|prEti̍|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|mithunaiḥ|jAyatE||32 (40) (ukthyEnOpApnOtya̍-gacCatAM̍ ~Myaḥ- purOḍAśa̍M-catvAriṃqśacca̍)(A9)̍
verses.samhita: cA &dhiśrayatyAjyaM̍ ca staMbayajuśca haratyaBi̍ ca# gRuhṇAti vEdiM̍ ca pari gRuhṇAti patnI̱M ca saMnahyati̍ prOkṣaṇIścA̍ &&sAdayatyAjyaM̍ caitAni vai dvAdaśa̍ dvandvAni# daṛśapUrṇamAsayOstAni ya Evaṃ saMpAdya yajatE̍ prajAtEnaiva̍ yajñEna# yajatE pra prajayA# paśuBir̍ mithunair jAyatE||32̍ (ukthyEnOpApnOtya̍-gacCatAM̍ ~Myaḥ - purOḍAśa̍M-catvAriṃqśacca̍)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) dhruvaḥ|asi|dhruvaḥ|aham|sajAtEṣviti# sa - jAtEṣu|BUyAsam|iti̍|Aha|dhruvAn|Eva|EnAn|kurutE|ugraḥ|asi|ugraḥ|aham|sajAtEṣviti̍# sa-jAtEṣu|BUyAsam|iti̍|Aha|apra̍tivAdina̍ ityaprati̍ - vAdinaḥ|Eva|EnAn|kurutE|aBiBUrityaBi̍ - BUḥ|asi|aBiBUrityaBi̍ - BUḥ|aham|sajAtEṣviti# sa - jAtEṣu|BUyAsam|iti̍|Aha|yaḥ|Eva|Enam|pratyutpipI̍ta̍ iti# prati-utpipItE|tam|upEti̍|asyatE|yunajmi̍|tvA|brahma̍ṇA|daivyE̍na|iti̍|Aha|Eṣaḥ|vai|agnEḥ|yOga̍ḥ|tEna̍|33̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dhruvO&si̍ dhruvO&haṃ̍ sajAtEṣu̍# BUyAsamityAha̍ dhruvAnEvainA̱n kuruta ugrO̱&syugrO&haṃ̍ sajAtEṣu̍# BUyAsa-mityAhAprativAdina̍ EvainA̱n kurutE-&BiBUrasyaBiBUrahaṃ̍ sajAtEṣu̍# BUyAsamityAha̍ ya EvainaM̍ pratyutpipItE̍ tamupA̱syatE yunajmi# tvA brahmaṇA̍ daivyEnEtyAhaiṣa̍ vA agnEryOgastEnai - [ ] 33

verses.padam: (Padam) Eva|Enam|yunakti|yajñasya|vai|samRu̍ddhEnEti̍ saM - RuddhEna|dEvAḥ|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Ayann|yajñasya|vyRu̍ddhEnEti̍ vi - RuddhEna|asurAn|parEti̍|aBAvayann|yat|mE|agnE|asya|yajñasya̍|riṣyA̱t|iti̍|Aha|yajñasya̍|Eva|tat|samRu̍ddhEnEti̍ saM - RuddhEna|yajamAnaḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Eti|yajñasya|vyRu̍ddhEnEti̍ vi - RuddhEna|BrAtRuvyAn|parEti̍|BAvayati|agnihOtramitya̍gni̍ - hOtram|EtABiḥ|vyAhRu̍tIBiriti̍ vyAhRuti̍ - Biḥ|upEti|sAdayEt|yajñamuKamiti̍# yajña - maKam|vai|agnihOtramityagni̍ - hOtram|brahma|EtAḥ|vyAhRu̍taya̍ iti# vi - AhRutayaḥ|yajñamuKa̍ iti# yajña - muKE|Eva|brahma|34̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vainaM̍ ~Myunakti yajñasya vai samRuddhEna̍ dEvAḥ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyan.̍ yajñasya vyRuddhEnAsu̍rAn̍ parABAvayan.̍ yanmE# agnE asya yajñasya riṣyAdityAha̍ yajñasyaiva tathsamRuddhEna̍ yajamAnaḥ̍ suvargaM ~MlOkamEti̍ yajñasya vyRuddhEna̍ BrAtRuvyAn̍ parA# BAvayatyagnihOtra-mEtABir vyAhRutIBirupa̍# sAdayEdyajñamuKaM ~MvA agnihOtraM̍ brahmaitA vyAhRutayO̍ yajñamuKa Eva brahma# - [ ] 34

verses.padam: (Padam) kurutE|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsarE|paryAgata̍ iti# pari - AgatE|EtABi̍ḥ|Eva|upEti̍|sAdayEt|brahma̍ṇA|Eva|uBayata̍ḥ|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|parIti|gRuhṇAti|darq.śapUrṇamAsAviti̍# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsau|cAturmAsyAnIti# cAtuḥ - mAsyAni|AlaBa̍mAna̍ ityA̱ - laBamAnaḥ|EtABi̍ḥ|vyAhRu̍tIBiriti̍ vyAhRuti̍ - Biḥ|havIṃṣi|Eti̍|sAdayEt|yajñamuKamiti̍# yajña - muKam|vai|darq.śapUrṇamAsAviti# daṛśa - pUrṇamAsau|cAturmAsyAnIti# cAtuḥ - mAsyAni|brahma̍|EtAḥ|vyAhRu̍taya̍ iti# vi - AhRutayaḥ|yajñamuKa̍ iti# yajña - muKE|Eva|brahma|kurutE|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsarE|paryAgata̍ iti# pari - AgatE|EtABi̍ḥ|Eva|Eti̍|sAdayEt|brahma̍ṇA|Eva|uBayata̍ḥ|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|parIti|gRuhṇAti|yat|vai|yajñasya̍|sAmnA̱|kriyatE̱|rAṣṭram|35̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kurutE saM~MvathsarE paryAgata̍ EtABirEvOpa̍# sAdayEd-brahmaṇaivOBayata̍ḥ̍ saM~MvathsaraM pari# gRuhṇAti daṛśapUrṇamAsau cAturmAsyAnyAlaBa̍mAna̍ EtABir vyAhRutIBir̍ havIṅṣyAsAdayEd̍ yajñamuKaM ~Mvai daṛśapUrṇamAsau̍ cAturmAsyAni̍ brahmaitA vyAhRutayO̍ yajñamuKa Eva brahma# kurutE saM~MvathsarE paryAgata̍ EtABirEvAsA̍dayEd̍ brahmaṇaivOBayata̍ḥ̍ saM~MvathsaraM parigRuhṇAti̍ yadvai yajñasya sAmnA̱ kriyatE# rAṣṭraM - [ ] 35

verses.padam: (Padam) yajñasya|AśIrityA̱̍ - śIḥ|gacCati|yat|RucA|viśa̱m|yajñasya|AśIrityA̱̍ - śIḥ|gacCati|atha|brAhmaṇaḥ|anAśIrkE̍ṇa|yajñEna̍|yajatE|sAmidhEnIriti̍# sAm - idhEnIḥ|anuvakṣyannityanu̍ - vakṣyann|EtAḥ|vyAhRutIriti̍# vi - AhRutIḥ|purastA̱t|daddhyAt|brahma̍|Eva|pratipadamiti̍# prati-pada̱m|kurutE|tathA̱|brAhmaṇaḥ|sAśI̱rkEṇEti sa -AśIrkEṇa|yajñEna|yajatE|yam|kAmayE̍ta|yaja̍mAnam|BrAtRu̍vyam|asya|yajñasya̍|AśIrityA̱̍ - śIḥ|gacCEt|iti|tasya̍|EtAḥ|vyAhRu̍tIriti̍# vi - AhRutIḥ|purOnuvAkyA̍yAmiti̍# puraḥ - anuvAkyAyAm|daddhyAt|BrAtRuvyadEvatyEti̍# BrAtRuvya - dEvatyA̱|vai|purOnuvAkyEti# puraḥ - anuvAkyA̱|BrAtRuvyam|Eva|asya|yajñasya̍|36̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ~MyajñasyA-*śIrgacCati̍ yadRucA viśaM̍ ~MyajñasyA- *śIrgacCatyatha̍# brAhmaṇO&nAśIrkE̍ṇa̍ yajñEna# yajatE sAmidhEnI-ranuvakṣyannEtA̍ vyAhRutIḥ̍ purastA̱ddaddhyAd brahmaiva pratipada̍M̍ kurutE tathA̱ brAhmaṇaḥ sAśI̱rkEṇa yajñEna# yajatE yaM kAmayEta̍ yajamAnaM̍ BrAtRuvyamasya̍ yajñasyA*śIrgacCEditi̍ tasyaitA vyAhRutIḥ̍ purOnuvAkyAyAM̍ daddhyAd BrAtRuvyadEvatyA# vai purOnuvAkyA̱̍ BrAtRuvyamEvAsya̍# yajñasyA-[ ] 36

verses.padam: (Padam) AśIrityA̱ - śIḥ|gacCati|yAn|kAmayEta|yaja̍mAnAn|samAva̍tI|EnAn|yajñasya̍|AśIrityA̱̍ - śIḥ|gacCEt|iti|tEṣA̱m|EtAḥ|vyAhRu̍tIriti̍# vi - AhRutIḥ|purOnuvAkyA̍yA̍ iti# puraḥ-anuvAkyAyAḥ|ad^^rdharca̍ ityaqd^^rdha-RucE|EkA̱m|daddhyAt|yAjyA̍yai|purastA̱t|EkA̱m|yAjyA̍yAḥ|ad^^rdharca̍ ityad^^rdha̍ - RucE|EkA̱m|tathA̱|EnAn|samAvatI|yajñasya̍|AśIrityA̱̍ - śIḥ|gacCati|yathA̱|vai|parjanyaḥ|suvRu̍ṣṭamiti̍ su - vRuṣṭam|vaṛṣati|Evam|yajñaḥ|yaja̍mAnAya|varq.ṣati|sthala̍yA|udakam|parigRuhṇantIti̍# pari - gRuhṇanti|AśiṣEtyA̱̍ - śiṣA̱|yajñam|yajamAnaḥ|parIti̍|gRuhṇAti|mana̍ḥ|asi|prAjApatyamiti̍# prAjA - patyam|37 (50)
verses.samhita: &&śIrgacCati̍ yAn kAmayEta̍ yajamAnAnth̍ samAvatyEnAn̍ yajñasyA &&śIrgacCEditi̍ tEṣAmEtA̍ vyAhRutIḥ̍ purOnuvAkyAyA̍ arddharca EkA̱M daddhyAd-yAjyAyai̍ purastAdEkA̱M ~MyAjyAyA̍ arddharca EkAM tathainAnth̍ samAvatI̍ yajñasyA &&śIrgacCati̍ yathA vai parjanyaḥ suvRuṣṭaM̍ ~MvaṛṣatyEvaM̍ ~MyajñO yajamAnAya̍ vaṛṣati sthalayOdakaM̍ parigRuhṇantyAśiṣA̍# yajñaM ~MyajamAnaḥ̍ pari# gRuhṇAti manO&si̍ prAjApatyaM - [ ] 37

verses.padam: (Padam) manasA|mA|BUtEna̍|Eti̍|viśa|iti̍|Aha|mana̍ḥ|vai|prAjApatyamiti̍# prAjA - patyam|prAjApatya iti# prAjA - patyaḥ|yajñaḥ|manaḥ|Eva|yajñam|Atmann|dhattE|vAk|asi|aindrI|sapatnakṣayaṇIti̍# sapatna - kṣayaṇI|vAcA|mA|indriyEṇa̍|Eti̍|viśa|iti̍|Aha|aindrI|vai|vAk|vAca̱m|Eva|aindrIm|Atmann|dhattE||38̍ (36) (tEnai-va brahma-̍ rAṣṭra-mEvAsya# yajñasya-prAjApatyaṃ-ṣaṭtriṃ̍śacca)̍ (A10)
verses.samhita: manasA̍ mA BUtEnA&&viśEtyAha̍ manO vai prAjApatyaM̍ prAjApatyO̍ yajñO mana# Eva yajñamAtman dhattE̍ vAgasyaindrI̍ sapatnakṣaya̍ṇI̍ vAcA mE̱ndriyEṇA-&&viśEtyAhaindrI̍ vai vAgvAca-mEvaindrI-̍ mAtman dhattE||38̍ (tEnai-va brahma-̍ rAṣṭramE-vAsya# yajñasya-prAjApatyaṃ-ṣaṭtriṃ̍śacca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) yaḥ|vai|saptadaśamiti# sapta - daśam|prajApatimiti̍# prajA - patim|yajñam|anvAyattamitya̍nu̍ - Ayattam|vEda̍|pratIti̍|yajñEna̍|tiṣṭhati|na|yajñAt|BraṃqśatE|Eti̍|śrAvaya|iti̍|catu̍rakṣaramiti̍ catuḥ̍ - akṣaram|astu|śrauṣa̍ṭ|iti̍|catu̍rakṣaramiti̍ catuḥ̍ - akṣaram|yaja|iti̍|dvya̍kṣaramiti̍ dvi - akṣaram|yE|yajAmahE|iti̍|pa~jcA̱kṣaramiti̍ pa~jca# - akṣaram|dvyakṣara iti# dvi - akṣaraḥ|vaṣaṭkAra iti# vaṣaṭ - kAraḥ|Eṣaḥ|vai|saptadaśa iti# sapta - daśaḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|yajñam|anvAyatta̍ ityanu-Aya̍ttaḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|pratIti̍|yajñEna̍|tiṣṭhati|na|yajñAt|BraṃqśatE|yaḥ|vai|yajñasya̍|prAya̍ṇamiti̍# pra - ayanam|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati - sthAm|39 (50)
verses.samhita: yO vai saptadaśaM̍ prajApatiM̍ ~MyajñamanvAyattaM̍ ~MvEda prati# yajñEna# tiṣṭhati na yajñAd Braṃśata̍ A śrAvayEti̍ caturakṣaramastu̍ śrauṣaḍiti caturakṣaraM̍ ~MyajEti dvyakṣaraM̍ ~MyE yajAmaha̍ iti pa~jcA̱kṣaraM dvyakṣarO vaṣaṭkAra̍ Eṣa vai saptadaśaḥ̍ prajApatir̍ yajñamanvAyattO̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda prati# yajñEna# tiṣṭhati na yajñAd- BraṃśatE̍ yO vai yajñasya prAyaṇaM̍ pratiṣṭhA -[ ] 39

verses.padam: (Padam) udayanamityu̍t̍ - ayanam|vEda̍|prati̍ṣṭhitEnEti̍ prati# - sthitEna|ariṣṭEna|yajñEna̍|saṅqsthAmiti̍# saM - sthAm|gacCati|Eti|śrAvaya|astu̍|śrauṣa̍ṭ|yaja̍|yE|yajA̍mahE|vaṣaṭkAra̍ iti# vaṣaṭ - kAraḥ|Etat|vai|yajñasya|prAya̍ṇamiti̍# pra - ayanam|EṣA|pratiṣṭhEti̍# prati - sthA|Etat|udayanamityu̍t̍ - ayanam|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|prati̍ṣṭhitEnEti̍ prati-sthitEna|ari̍ṣṭEna|yajñEna̍|saṅqsthAmiti̍# saM - sthAm|gacCati|yaḥ|vai|sUnRutAyai|dOha̱m|vEda̍|duhE|Eva|EnAm|yajñaḥ|vai|sUnRutA̱|Eti̍|śrAvaya|iti̍|Eti̍|Eva|EnAm|ahvat|astu̍|40̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mudayanaM̍ ~MvEda pratiṣṭhitEnAri̍ṣṭEna̍ yajñEna# saṅqsthAM gacCatyAśrA̍vayAstu̍ śrauṣaḍyaja yE yajAmahE̍ vaṣaṭkAra Etadvai yajñasya prAyaṇamEṣA̍ pratiṣṭhaitadudaya̍naM̍ ~Mya EvaM ~MvEda pratiṣṭhitEnA&ri̍ṣṭEna̍ yajñEna# saṅqsthAM gacCati̍ yO vai sUnRutAyai̍ dOhaM ~MvEda# duha EvainA̱M ~MyajñO vai sUnRutA && śrAvayEtyaivainA̍-mahvadastu̍ - [ ] 40

verses.padam: (Padam) śrauṣaṭ|iti̍|upAvA̱srAgityu̍pa-avA̱srAk|yaja̍|iti̍|uditi̍|anaiṣIt|yE|yajA̍mahE|iti̍|upEti̍|asadat|vaṣaṭkArEṇEti̍# vaṣaṭ-kArEṇa|dOgdhi|Eṣaḥ|vai|sUnRutA̍yai|dOha̍ḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|duhE|Eva|EnAm|dEvAḥ|vai|satram|Asata|tEṣA̱m|diśa̍ḥ|adasyann|tE|EtAm|ArdrAm|pa~gktim|apaśyann|Eti̍|śrAvaya|iti̍|purOvAtamiti̍# puraḥ - vAtam|ajanayann|astu|śrauṣa̍ṭ|iti̍|aBram|samiti̍|aplAvayann|yaja̍|iti̍|vidyutamiti̍# vi - dyuta̱m|41 (50)
verses.samhita: śrauṣaḍityupAvA̱srAgyajEtyudanaiṣIdyE̍ yajAmaha̍ ityupA&sadad̍ vaṣaṭkArEṇa# dOgddhyEṣa vai sUnRutAyai̍ dOhO ya EvaM ~MvEda# duha EvainA̱M dEvA vai satramAsata̍ tEṣAM diśO&dasyanta̍ EtAmArdrAM pa~gktimapaśyannA̍ śrAvayEti̍# purOvAta-majanayannastu̍ śrauṣaḍityaBraṃ samaplAvayanq.̍ yajEti# vidyuta# - [ ] 41

verses.padam: (Padam) ajanayann|yE|yajAmahE|iti̍|prEti̍|avarq.ṣayann|aBIti̍|astanayann|vaṣaṭkArEṇEti̍# vaṣaṭ - kArEṇa|tata̍ḥ|vai|tEBya̍ḥ|diśa̍ḥ|prEti̍|apyAyanta|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|prEti̍|asmai|diśa̍ḥ|pyAyantE|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|tvOvEdEti# tvaḥ - vEda|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|tvaM~MvEdEti# tvaM - vEda|yam|prajApatiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|vEda|saḥ|puṇya̍ḥ|Bavati|Eṣaḥ|vai|Candasya̍ḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|Eti|śrAvaya|astu̍|śrauṣa̍ṭ|yaja̍|yE|yajA̍mahE|vaṣaṭkAra̍ iti# vaṣaṭ - kAraḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|puṇya̍ḥ|Bavati|vasantam|42̍ (50)
verses.samhita: majanayanq. yE yajAmaha̍ iti prAvaṛṣayannaBya̍stanayan̍ vaṣaṭkArEṇa tatO vai tEByO diśaḥ prApyAyanta̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda prAsmai diśaḥ̍ pyAyantE prajApatiM̍ tvOvEda# prajApati̍ stvaM~MvEda yaM prajApatir̍ vEda sa puṇyO# BavatyEṣa vai Candasya̍ḥ̍ prajApatirA̍ śrAvayA&stu̍ śrauṣaḍyaja yE yajAmahE̍ vaṣaṭkArO ya EvaM ~MvEda puṇyO# Bavati vasanta - [ ] 42

verses.padam: (Padam) RutUnAm|prIṇAmi|iti|Aha|Rutava̍ḥ|vai|prayAjA̍ iti# pra - yAjAḥ|RutUn|Eva|prIṇAti|tE|asmai|prItAḥ|yathApUrvamiti# yathA - pUrvam|kalpantE|kalpantE|asmai|Rutava̍ḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|agnIṣOma̍yOrityagnI̍ - sOmayOḥ|aham|dEvayajyayEti̍# dEva-yajyayA̱|cakṣuṣmAn|BUyAsam|iti̍|Aha|agnIṣOmA̱ByAmityagnI̍ - sOmA̱ByAm|vai|yajñaḥ|cakṣuṣmAn|tAByA̱m|Eva|cakṣu̍ḥ|Atmann|dhattE|agnEḥ|aham|dEvayajyayEti̍# dEva - yajyayA̱|annAda ityanna̍ - adaḥ|BUyAsam|iti|Aha|agniḥ|vai|dEvAnA̱m|annAda̍ ityanna̍ - adaḥ|tEna|Eva|43̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mRutUnAM̍ prIṇAmItyA̍hartavO̍ vai prayAjA̍ RutUnEva prIṇAti̍ tE̱&smai prItA yathApUrvaM̍ kalpantE̍ kalpantE&smA̍ RutavO ya EvaM ~MvEdAgnIṣOmayOrahaM̍ dEvayajyayA̍ cakṣuṣmAn̍ BUyAsamityA-hAgnIṣOmA̱ByAM̍ vai yajñaścakṣuṣmAn̍ tAByAmEva̍ cakṣurAtman̍ dhattE̍ &gnErahaM dEvayajyayA̱&nnAdO̍ BUyAsamityA̍hAgnirvai̍ dEvAnAmannAdastE̍ nai vA - [ ] 43

verses.padam: (Padam) annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|Atmann|dhattE|dabdhiḥ|asi|ada̍bdhaḥ|BUyAsam|amum|daBEyam|iti̍|Aha|EtayA̱|vai|dabdhyA̱|dEvAḥ|asu̍rAn|adaBnuvaqnn|tayA̱|Eva|BrAtRu̍vyam|daBnOti|agnIṣOma̍yOrityagnI̍ - sOmayOḥ|aham|dEvayajyayEti̍# dEva - yajyayA̱|vRutrahEti# vRutra - hA|BUyAsam|iti|Aha|agnIṣOmA̱ByAmityagnI̍ - sOmA̱ByAm|vai|indraḥ|vRutram|ahann|tAByA̱m|Eva|BrAtRu̍vyam|stRuṇutE|indrAgniyOritI̱ndra̍ - agniyOḥ|aham|dEvayajyayEti# dEva - yajyayA̱|indriyAvI|annAda ityanna̍ - adaḥ|BUyAsam|iti|Aha|indriyAvI|Eva|annAda̍ ityanna̍ - adaḥ|Bavati|indrasya|44̍ (50)
verses.samhita: &nnAdya-mAtman̍ dhattE̍ dabdhirasyada̍bdhO̍ BUyAsamamuM daBEyamityA̍haitayA̍ vai dabddhyA# dEvA asurAnadaBnuvantayaiva̍ BrAtRuvyaM̍ daBnOtyagnIṣOmayOrahaM̍ dEvayajyayA̍# vRutrahA BUyAsamityA̍hA&gnIṣOmA̱ByAM̍ ~MvA indrO# vRutramahantAByA̍mEva̍ BrAtRuvyaṅ̍ stRuṇuta indrAgniyOrahaM dEvayajyayE̱ndriyAvya̍nnAdO̍ BUyAsamityA̍hEndriyAvyE̍vAnnAdO̍ BavatIndra̍syA̍ - [ ] 44

verses.padam: (Padam) aham|dEvayajyayEti# dEva-yajyayA̱|indriyAvI|BUyAsam|iti|Aha|indriyAvI|Eva|Bavati|mahEndrasyEti̍# mahA - indrasya|aham|dEvayajyayEti̍# dEva - yajyayA̱|jEmAna̱m|mahimAna̱m|gamEyam|iti|Aha|jEmAna̱m|Eva|mahimAna̱m|gacCati|agnEḥ|sviṣṭakRuta̍ iti# sviṣṭa - kRutaḥ|aham|dEvayajyayEti̍# dEva - yajyayA̱|AyuṣmAn|yajñEna̍|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati- sthAm|gamEyam|iti|Aha|Ayu̍ḥ|Eva|Atmann|dhattE|pratIti̍|yajñEna̍|tiṣṭhati||45̍ (38) (pratiṣṭhA-mahvadastu̍-vidyuta̍M-~MvasantaM-tEnaivE-ndra̍syA-ṣṭAtriṃ̍śacca)̍ (A11)
verses.samhita: &haM dEvayajyayE̱ndriyAvI̍ BUyAsamityA̍hEndriyAvyE̍va̍ Bavati̍ mahEndrasyA&haM dEvayajyayA̍# jEmAnaM̍ mahimAnaM̍ gamEyamityAha̍ jEmAnamEva̍ mahimAna̍M̍ gacCatyagnEḥ sviṣṭakRutO&haM̍ dEvayajyayA̍ &&yuṣmAn.̍ yajñEna# pratiṣṭhAM gamEyamityA-hAyu̍rEvAtman̍ dhattE̍ prati# yajñEna# -tiṣṭhati||45 ( pratiṣṭhA-mahvadastu̍-vidyuta̍M-~MvasantaM-̍ tEnaivE-ndrasyA-&ṣṭAtriṃ̍śacca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) indra̱m|vaḥ|viśvataḥ|parIti̍|havA̍mahE|janE̱Byaḥ||asmAka̱m|astu|kEva̍laḥ||indra̱m|nara̍ḥ|nEmadhitEti̍# nEma - dhitA|havantE|yat|pAryA̱ḥ|yunajatE|dhiya̍ḥ|tAḥ||śUra̍ḥ|nRuṣAtEti̍ nRu - sAtA|śavasaḥ|cakAnaḥ|Eti̍|gOmatIti̍ gO - mati|vrajE|Baja|tvam|naḥ||indriyAṇi|śatakratO̍ iti# śata - kratO|yA|tE|janEṣu|pa~jcasviti̍## pa~jca - su||indra|tAni̍|tE|Eti̍|vRuṇE||anviti̍|tE|dAyi|mahE|indriyAya̍|satrA|tE|viśva̱m|anviti̍|vRutrahatya̍ iti# vRutra - hatyE̱||anviti|46̍ (50)
verses.samhita: indraM̍ ~MvO viśvataspari havAmahE̍ janE̱Byaḥ|asmAkamastu̍ kEvalaḥ||indraM̍ narO# nEmadhitA̍ havantE yatpAryA# yunajatE̍ dhiyastAḥ|śUrO nRuṣAtA̍ śavasaścakAna̍ A gOmati̍ vrajE BajA̍ tvannaḥ||indriyAṇi̍# śatakratO yA tE janEṣu̍ pa~jcasu||indra̍ tAni# ta A vRuṇE||anu̍# tE dAyi maha indriyAya̍# satrA tE viśvamanu# vRutrahatyE̱|anu# - [ ] 46

verses.padam: (Padam) kṣatram|anviti|saha̍ḥ|yajatra|indra̍|dEvEBi̍ḥ|anviti̍|tE|nRuṣahya̍ iti# nRu-sahyE̱||Eti|yasminn̍|sapta|vAsavAḥ|tiṣṭha̍nti|svAruha̍ iti# sva - ruhaḥ|yathA||Ruṣi̍ḥ|ha|dIrGaśrutta̍ma̍ iti# dIrGaśrut - tamaḥ|indrasya|Garmaḥ|ati̍thiḥ||AmAsu̍|pakvam|aira̍yaḥ|Eti̍|sUrya̱m|rOhayaḥ|divi||Garmam|na|sAmann̍|tapata|suvRuktiBiriti̍# suvRukti - Biḥ|juṣṭa̱m|girvaṇasE|gira̍ḥ||indra̱m|it|gAthina̍ḥ|bRuhat|indra̱m|arkEBi̍ḥ|arkiṇa̍ḥ||indra̱m|vAṇI̱ḥ|anUṣata||gAya̍nti|tvA|gAyatriṇa̍ḥ|47̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kṣatramanu sahO# yajatrEndra# dEvEBiranu# tE nRuṣahyE̱||Ayasmi̱nth saptavAsavA̍ stiṣṭhanti̍ svAruhO# yathA|Ruṣiṛha̍ dIrGaśruttama̍ indrasya̍ GarmO atithiḥ||AmAsu̍# pakvamairaya̍ A sUryaṃ# rOhayO divi|GarmaM na sAmaM̍ tapatA suvRuktiBir juṣṭaM girvaṇasE̍ giraḥ||indramid̍ gAthinO# bRuhadindra-markEBi̍-rarkiṇa̍ḥ|indraM̍ ~MvAṇIranUṣata||gAya̍nti̍ tvA gAyatriṇO- [ ] 47

verses.padam: (Padam) arcanti|arkam|arkiṇa̍ḥ||brahmAṇa̍ḥ|tvA|śatakrataviti̍# śata - kratO|uditi|vaṃqśam|iva|yEmirE||aṃqhOmuca̍ ityaṃhaḥ̍ - mucE̱|prEti|BarEma|manIṣAm|OṣiṣṭhadAv.nna̍ ityOṣiṣṭha̍ - dAv.nnE̱|sumatimiti# su - matim|gRuṇAnAḥ||idam|indra|pratIti|havyam|gRuBAya|satyAḥ|santu|yaja̍mAnasya|kAmA̱ḥ||vivEṣa̍|yat|mA|dhiṣaṇA̱|jajAna̍|stavai̱|purA|pAryA̱t|indra̱m|ahna̍ḥ||aṃha̍saḥ|yatra̍|pIpara̍t|yathA̱|naḥ|nAvA|iva|yAnta̱m|uBayE̱|havantE||prEti̍|samrAjamiti̍# saM - rAja̱m|prathamam|addhvarAṇA̱m|48 (50)
verses.samhita: &rcantyarka-markiṇa̍ḥ|brahmAṇa̍stvA̍ śatakratavud-vaṃqśa-miva̍ yEmirE||aṃqhOmucE pra BarEmA̍ manIṣAmOṣiṣṭhadAv.nnE̍# sumatiM gRuṇAnAḥ|idami̍ndra̍ prati# havyaM gRuBAya̍ satyAḥ santu̍ yajamAnasya̍ kAmA̱ḥ||vivEṣa yanmA# dhiṣaṇA# jajAna stavai# purA pAryAdindra-mahnaḥ|aṃha̍sO̍ yatra# pIparadyathA# nO nAvEva yAnta# muBayE# havantE||pra samrAjaM̍ prathama-maddhvarAṇA̍# - [ ] 48

verses.padam: (Padam) aṃqhOmucamityaṃhaḥ̍ - muca̱m|vRuṣaBam|yajñiyAnAm||apAm|napA̍tam|aśvinA|haya̍ntam|asminn|naraḥ|indriyam|dhattam|Oja̍ḥ||vIti̍|naḥ|indra|mRudha̍ḥ|jahi|nIcA|yacCa|pRutanyataḥ||adhaspadamitya̍dhaḥ̍ - padam|tam|Im|kRudhi|yaḥ|asmAn|aBidAsatItyaBi̍ - dAsati||indra̍|kṣatram|aBIti̍|vAmam|Oja̍ḥ|ajA̍yathAḥ|vRuṣaBa|carq.ṣaṇInAm||apEti̍|anudaḥ|jana̱m|amitrayantamitya̍mitra̍ - yanta̱m|urum|dEvEByaḥ|akRuṇOḥ|u|lOkam||mRugaḥ|na|BImaḥ|kucaraḥ|giriṣṭhA̍ iti# giri - sthAḥ|parAvata iti# parA - vataḥ|49̍ (50)
verses.samhita: maṃhOmucaM̍ ~MvRuṣaBaM ~MyajñiyAnAM|apAM̍ napAtamaśvinA̍ hayanta-masminna̍ra̍ indriyaM dhattamOja̍ḥ||vi̍ na# indra mRudhO# jahi nIcA yacCa̍ pRutanyataḥ|adhaspadaM tamI̱M kRudhi yO asmAṃ aBidAsa̍ti||indra̍# kṣatramaBi vAmamOjO &jAyathA̍ vRuṣaBa caṛṣaṇInAM|apAnudO̍ jana-mamitrayanta̍-muruM̍ dEvEByO# akRuṇO-ru lOkaM||mRugO na BImaḥ kucarO̍ giriṣṭhAḥ̍ parAvata̍ - [ ] 49

verses.padam: (Padam) Eti|jagAma|para̍syAḥ||sRukam|saṃqśAyEti̍# saM-śAya|pavim|indra|tigmam|vIti̍|śatrUn̍|tAḍhi|vIti̍|mRudha̍ḥ|nudasva||vIti̍|śatrUn̍|vIti̍|mRudha̍ḥ|nuda|vIti̍|vRutrasya̍|hanU̍ iti|ruja||vIti̍|manyum|indra|BAmitaḥ|amitra̍sya|aBidAsa̍ta̍ ityaBi̍ - dAsataḥ||trAtAra̱m|indra̱m|avitAra̱m|indra̱m|havE̍hava̍ iti havE̱ - havE|suhavamiti# su - hava̱m|śUra̱m|indra̱m||huvE|nu|śakram|puruhUtamiti# puru - hUtam|indra̱m|svasti|naḥ|maGavEti# maGa - vA|dhAtu|indraḥ||mA|tE|asyAm|50̍ (50)
verses.samhita: A jagAmA̍ parasyAḥ|sRukaṃ̍ saṃqśAya# pavimindra̍ tigmaM ~Mvi śatrU̱n tAḍhi vimRudhO# nudasva||vi śatrUnq. vi mRudhO# nuda vivRutrasya hanU# ruja|vi manyumindra̍ BAmitO&mitra̍syA&BidAsa̍taḥ||trAtAra-mindra̍-mavitAra-mindraṃq̍ havEhavE̍ suhavaṃq śUramindra̱M|huvE nu śakraM puruhUtamindraṅ̍# svasti nO# maGavA# dhAtvindraḥ||mA̍ tE# asyAṃ - [ ] 50

verses.padam: (Padam) sahasAvanniti# sahasA - vann|pariṣṭau|aGAya̍|BUma|hariva̍ iti# hari - vaḥ|parAdA iti# parA - dai||trAyasva|naḥ|avRukEBi̍ḥ|varU̍thaiḥ|tava̍|priyAsa̍ḥ|sUriṣu̍|syAma||ana̍vaḥ|tE|ratha̱m|aśvA̍ya|takṣann|tvaṣṭA̱|vajra̱m|puruhUtEti̍# puru - hUta|dyumantamiti# dyu - manta̱m||brahmAṇaḥ|indra̱m|mahaya̍ntaḥ|arkaiḥ|ava̍rdhayann|aha̍yE|hantavai|u||vRuṣṇE̱|yat|tE|vRuṣa̍ṇaḥ|arkam|arcAn̍|indra̍|grAvA̍ṇaḥ|adi̍tiḥ|sajOṣA̍ iti# sa - jOṣA̱ḥ||anaśvAsaḥ|yE|pavaya̍ḥ|arathAḥ|indrE̍ṣitA̍ itIndra# - iṣitAḥ|aByavartantEtya̍Bi̍ - avartanta|dasyUn̍||51̍ (48) (vRutrahatyE&nu-gAyatriṇO̱-&dhvarAṇA̱M-parAvatO-&syA-maṣṭAca̍tvAriṃśacca)̍ (A12) Prasna KOrvai with starting Padams of 1 to 12 Anuvaakams :- (saMtvA# si~jcAmi-dhruvO̱-&syagnirmA-baṛhiṣO&ha-mA̍ pyAyatA-maga̍nma-yathA̍ vai-yO vai śraddhAM- prajApatiryajñAn-dhruvO̍sItyA̍ha-yO̍ vai saptadaśa-mindra̍M̍ ~MvO-dvAdaśa|)̍ KOrvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (saMtvA-baṛhiṣO&haM-~MyathA̍ vA-EvaM ~MvidvA-~jCrauṣaṭth-sAhasAva-nnEka̍pa~jcAśat|)̍ First and Last Padam of śixth Prasnam:- (saMtvA# si~jcAmi - dasyUn|)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE prathamakAṇḍE ṣaṣṭhaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||
verses.samhita: sahasAvan̍ pariṣṭAvaGAya̍# BUma harivaḥ parAdai|trAyasva̍ nO &vRukEBir varUthai-stava̍# priyAsaḥ̍ sUriṣu# syAma||anavastE̍ rathamaśvAya̍ takṣan tvaṣṭA vajraM̍ puruhUta dyumanta̱M|brahmAṇa indraM̍ mahayantO̍ arkairavarddhayannaha̍yE̍ hantavA u||vRuṣṇE̍ yat tE vRuṣaṇO̍ arkamarcAnindra grAvAṇO̍ aditiḥ̍ sajOṣA̱ḥ|anaśvAsO yE pavayO&rathA̍ indrEṣitA̍ aByavartta̍ ntaq dasyUn||51̍ (vRutrahatyE&nu-gAyatriṇO̱-&ddharAṇA̱M-parAvatO-&syA-maṣṭAca̍tvAriṃśacca)̍ (A12) praśna korvai with starting padams of 1 to 12 anuvAkams :- (santvA# si~jcAmi-dhruvO̱-&syagnirmA-barqḥiṣO&ha-mA̍ pyAyatA-maga̍nma-yathA̍ vai-yO vai śraddhAM- prajApatir̍ yajñAn-dhruvO&sItyA̍ha-yO̍ vai saptadaśa-mindra̍M̍ ~MvO-dvAdaśa|)̍ korvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- santvA-barqḥiṣO&haM-~MyathA̍ vA-EvaM ~MvidvA-~jCrauṣaṭth-sAhasAva-nnEka̍pa~jcAśat|first̍ and last padam of sixth praśnam:- santvA-si~jcAmi̍ dasyUn|||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM prathamakAṇḍE ṣaṣṭhaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||--------------------------------------------------------------------------------- OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ|hariḥ OM||1.7 prathamakAṇḍE saptamaḥ praśnaḥ -
